name: "Broken Heart" Tee
description:
Be proud to own the first Awakened Tee and represent out on the street!

Black T-Shirt with white print.
Large Awakened text with broken heart floating over the city. small lyric print "What do you do when it's all over..." If you know the words to the songs you'll know it all ties in! sweet.

name: We'll Never Recover, If We Forget
description:
"We'll Never Recover, If We Forget" is The Awakened's new studio E.p recorded and release in October 2008. Containing their most accomplished and epic material yet.

**Now Available as MP3 download Or CD in the Post.**

Track Listing: 
1. Flowers For The Fallen
2. My Broken Heart 
3. Not Falling
4. The Following (Live)

ORDER WITH A T-SHIRT AND GET THIS ITEM FREE!!

name: From The Ashes
description: "From The Ashes" is The Awakened's second studio E.p recorded and release in July 2007 to co-incide with the biggest gig of their lives at the Mean Fiddler, London. **Now Available as MP3 download Or CD in the Post.** Track Listing: 1. The Following 2. Built In A Day 3. For What It's Worth (Acoustic) ORDER WITH A T-SHIRT AND GET THIS ITEM FREE!!

name: One Eye On The Window
description:
"One Eye On The Window" is The Awakened's debut studio E.p recorded and release in June 2006.

**Now Available as MP3 download Or CD in the Post.**

Track Listing: 
1. Close My Eyes
2. One More Day 
3. A Little South Of Heaven
4. Braveheart

ORDER WITH A T-SHIRT AND GET THIS ITEM FREE!!
